projects.title: Justice Transcribe
projects.description: Ai service deployed at national scale, automating probation meetings using Azure speech-to-text and LLM-generated summaries.
achievements: Delivered 34,000+ transcriptions and summaries by Nov 2025
Scaling from pilot to national rollout for c. 40,000 probation officers
Added automated tests, coverage reporting, and secure CI/CD
projects.learnings: Integration with PostHog and Sentry to ensure robust monitoring and error handling. Compliance with data retention policies for PII in LangFuse and Azure Storage Account. Configuration of retention schemes and automated cleanup with audio blob versioning. Prompt versioning in Langfuse.

projects.title: Ai Email Agent
projects.description: 3-month tech spike proof-of-concept: an agentic Microsoft Outlook automation system that orchestrates inbox management, enacts user-defined policies, drafts responses, and integrates with Microsoft Entra SSO.
achievements: Integrated Microsoft Entra SSO via MSAL
Built email policy orchestration engine with LLM agents
Automated inbox triage and response drafting
projects.learnings: Efficient design of agentic tool calling - synchronous tool operations with async and partials. Multi agent orchestration with agent-based task allocation and coordination.

projects.title: MoJ GitHub Chat
projects.description: Prototype semantic search tool for exploring organisation repositories using RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) and agentic orchestration. Helps MoJ developers discover relevant projects and code across an extremely large GitHub organisation.
achievements: Implemented RAG architecture with vector embeddings using open source ChromaDB
First agentic system built with OpenAI's structured output endpoints
Enabled cross-repository hybrid search, combining keyword and semantic search
projects.learnings: Structured endpoint queries with Pydantic tool definitions for strict typing with a robust retry strategy. Optimisation of RAG responses with Langfuse user scores resulted in multi-agent orchestration and hybrid search algorithm, improving user evaluation from ave 2.2 to 4.1 / 5.0

projects.title: Daemon Ai Assistant
projects.description: Prototype autonomous reviewer for document analysis using modern web technologies. Built with Vercel v0 for rapid UI iteration and FastAPI backend for LLM integration.
achievements: Modern Next.js frontend with responsive design
FastAPI backend with structured LLM outputs
projects.learnings: Vercel v0 dramatically accelerates innovation. Combining Next.js frontend with FastAPI backend provides excellent developer experience and deployment flexibility. GPT-4o series performed poorly at selecting text indices for text highlighting.

projects.title: Langfuse Observability Platform
projects.description: Self-hosted Langfuse instance in Azure supporting monitoring and evaluation of all LLM completions across the directorate. Comprehensive infrastructure-as-code deployment with automated SSL and DNS.
achievements: Deployed using Terraform and Helm with full IaC
Automated SSL with cert-manager + Let's Encrypt
projects.learnings: Container orchestration with k8s, SSL automation, DNS delegation, SMTP relay with Azure Communications Service, distributed database management with zookeeper and clickhouse.

projects.title: Ai News Crawler
projects.description: Ai-powered prototype news crawler using LangChain and the DuckDuckGo MCP server to ingest relevant articles into ChromaDB for RAG-based semantic search.
achievements: Integrated MCP server for web search
ChromaDB vector storage for semantic search
projects.learnings: MCP (Model Context Protocol) provides interesting abstractions for tool use. Web scraping requires robust error handling and rate limiting to be production-ready.

projects.title: User Personas Generator
projects.tagline: Rapid persona and requirements generation tool
projects.description: Tool for rapidly generating user personas and project requirements through conversational AI. Features concurrent chat stream management for exploring needs and requirements within provided project contexts.
projects.learnings: Concurrent stream management in Python Shiny. LLMs excel at structured persona generation for various contexts.

projects.title: PyROSM Cities Explorer
projects.description: Fast exploration of OpenStreetMap data across international urban areas using PyROSM. Developed as an onboarding tool for graduate data scientists transitioning to geospatial work at ONS Data Science Campus.
achievements: Integrated PyROSM for efficient OpenStreetMap spatial feature parsing
Deployed educational tool for DSC onboarding
projects.learnings: PyROSM provides efficient parsing of granular spatial data, although accuracy and timeliness vary by area. Supported scalable exploration of national transport performance analysis.

projects.title: UnifyR Join Demonstrator
projects.description: Educational tool demonstrating dplyr join types with interactive input/output dataframe visualization. Developed as a learning aid for the Reproducible Analytical Pipelines training programme, helping Caribbean CARICOM analysts transition to programmatic data analysis.
projects.learnings: Visual demonstrations of data transformations significantly improve learning outcomes. Interactive tools help analysts transition from GUI-based to code-based workflows.

projects.title: UK COVID Mobility Tracker
projects.description: Interactive time series visualization of Google Mobility data by UK region, local authority, and clinical commissioning group. Urgent response tool developed at onset of ONS Data Science Campus employment to provide insight on movement patterns during COVID-19 outbreak and government containment measures.
achievements: Interactive time series with policy annotations
projects.learnings: Timely response to emerging gaps and priorities in data landscape, making the best of poor data format to help steer policy.

projects.title: Wales Schools Finance Explorer
projects.tagline: Educational budget analysis and outlier detection
projects.description: Educational budget analysis tool developed for Wales Audit Office financial audits. Features novel scatter visualizations showing relationships between student enrollment and various budget categories, revealing clear correlations by school phase and size for outlier identification.
achievements: Created interactive correlation visualizations allowing greater control over data exploration
Enabled subject matter expert self-service analysis
projects.learnings: Domain expert self-service tools accelerate analysis workflows, helped to steer emerging priorities towards a reproducible analytical pipeline
